Posts.Content: Sep 7, 2011 03:43PM Dana25 wrote: So I did it!! I went to Stanford for the AC x3 more cycles. One down, 2 more to go. I really do think it will go well this time. Thanks everyone for your support and feedback. It really does help!!
Posts.Title: More Chemo after Rare Complication? Dana25 dlb823

Posts.Content: Dana25 wrote: Hi everyone-need some advice. I started TAC in Feb and was scheduled to have 6 rounds. After round 3 I had neutropenic colitis causing a perforated bowel, an ICU stay and surgery. After recovering from surgery, I did BMX. Path came back clean except for 1 node with macrometastases. After surgery asked MO if I need any additional chemo and he said no. I went on to rads. After rads asked MO again if I need chemo and again no. Went for second opinion at Stanford and immediately the MO recommended ACx3 more rounds to complete my treatment being TNBC stage 3 minus the taxotere to decrease my risk of reoccurrence. I am very scared to get more chemo after the bowel perforation however I want to throw everything at it I can. Nervous!! Dx 2/14/2011, IDC, 6cm+, Stage IIIA, Grade 3, 1/4 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: More Chemo after Rare Complication? Dana25 dlb823

Posts.Content: Sep 22, 2011 11:14AM Dana25 wrote: The first time around I lost my eyelashes and eyebrows 2 weeks after my last TAC chemo. My hair started growing back 2 months after my last treatment. Has anyone used Revital Hair, Lash or Brow??
